resources.string: inforward to help you having the most accurate result related to the COVID-19 Please answer to the 4 first questions first. Those are the most important symptoms today. Next you can find the checklist of the second categories of symptoms, if needed.
Hebt u hoofdpijn, specifiek achter de ogen?
Hebt u spierpijn of last van stijfheid, zonder te sporten?
Hebt u last van smaak-of geurloosheid?
Hebt u last om te ademen(of buiten adem zijn)?
Hebt u pijn aan u spieren of articulaties zonder te hebben gesport?
" Please daily check your temperature(fever) and stay safe, keep following your symptoms! Please respect the rules of distance between people and follow safety precautions.";
